entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 March 2023
